items.text: slider on leg, flicked behind square to fine leg
length, straightens outside off, slaps off the backfoot to long-on
full outside off, driven into covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Dickwella, no run

items.text: chipped in the air but safely past the in-field. It swings away and as a result he chips it off the outer half of the bat. One-bounce over long-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Dickwella, FOUR runs

items.text: slower this time, meets the pitch outside off and drives to sweeper cover
did that carry? A stunning effort from Rahim. Tharanga opened tehe face to one that jagged away and Rahim flings himself to his left and gets a glove to it with the ball dying on him
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, no run

items.text: pushes away from the body without moving the feet and gets beaten
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, no run

items.preText: saiful-BD: "Saifuddin reminds me of Abul Hasan and any other potential pace allrounders BD had. Great to see on paper, never gives you any confidence when they get on the pitch."
items.text: full outside off, driven to long-off
full around off, punched to covers
full on middle, flicked to long-on
short of a length, backs away and punches to the left of the bowler
full outside off, pushed into the covers
length ball around off, that's the ideal length for the sweep and he crunches it over the cow corner region
short and wide, backs away and cuts through cover
short of a length, opens the face to third man
loosely hangs the bat out to one that jags away without moving the feet and the ball beats the bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short of a length, outside off, opens the face and runs down to third man
gets beaten as he flashes outside
items.postText: Anuruddha : "Isn't what Kusal did better than what Tharanga is doing here? " Really? A short 10-something ball blitz over a consolidating, reviving innings that tries to ensure they bat out 50 overs? On such a track, that too!
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Dickwella, no run

items.text: ah, what has Dickwella done here? Gets a shortish delivery that pitches on leg stump and gets slightly big on him. He closes the face but is completely stifled to play any sort of meaningful shot. Closes the face early and gets a leading edge as the ball lobs in the air for point to settle under it

dismissal.text: N Dickwella c Sabbir Rahman b Mohammad Saifuddin 42 (57b 4x4 0x6) SR: 73.68

items.text: good length, flicked through square leg

items.preText:
Now that there's a right-hander, immediately in comes Shakib

MD. SHAKHAWATH : "Is mortoza saving his best bowlers to bowl in death overs? Sounds like a plan......but if SL has wickets in hand in last 15 overs Mortoza surely will have a problem even with his best bowlers!"
items.text: full and sliding, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: comes down the track and tries to flick, gets hit on the pad as the ball trickles away behind the stumps on the off side. Appeal turned down because of an inside edge
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: fuller on off, flicked into the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full and accurate outside off, drilled back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle and off, drilled down the pitch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run
